- Create UI components for displaying images, videos, and other files
- Add file type converters \(FileTypeToIconConverter, FileTypeToTextConverter\)
- Add permissions for Android \(AndroidManifest\) and iOS \(Info.plist\)
- Support all file types: images \(inline preview\), video, audio, documents
- Clean up old server files \(moved to ICYOU.Server.Linux\)
